    1: def __getattr__(attr_name):
    2:     import warnings
    3: 
    4:     from numpy.fft import _helper
    5:     ret = getattr(_helper, attr_name, None)
    6:     if ret is None:
    7:         raise AttributeError(
    8:             f"module 'numpy.fft.helper' has no attribute {attr_name}")
    9:     warnings.warn(
   10:         "The numpy.fft.helper has been made private and renamed to "
   11:         "numpy.fft._helper. All four functions exported by it (i.e. fftshift, "
   12:         "ifftshift, fftfreq, rfftfreq) are available from numpy.fft. "
   13:         f"Please use numpy.fft.{attr_name} instead.",
   14:         DeprecationWarning,
   15:         stacklevel=3
   16:     )
   17:     return ret
